review_discussion.author: amahboubi
review_discussion.comment: I do not know what "natural" means. I just write "new arithmetic theorems".

tags.description: Issue or PR about addition of features.

commits.author: CohenCyril
commits.message:
Added and generalized arithmetic theorems.

- Added: `modn_divl` and `divn_modl`.
- Generalized `muln_modr` and `muln_modl` removing hypothesis `0 < p`.
